name: OmniFocus GTD
description: Complete OmniFocus task management with search, batch operations, recurring tasks, and comprehensive GTD features.
readme:
# OmniFocus GTD Extension

A comprehensive OmniFocus integration for Claude Desktop that enables natural language task management.

## Features
- Add tasks with natural language parsing
- Search across all tasks
- Edit task properties
- Batch create tasks with subtasks
- Create recurring tasks
- View and process inbox
- List today's tasks and upcoming due dates
- Complete tasks by name
- List projects with statistics
- View deferred, flagged, and overdue tasks
- Weekly and daily reviews
- Full GTD methodology support
